publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7737.1 Jim Mather: Opportunities for Young People—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7737) in the name of Robin Harper, insert at end "building on the excellent work by the Prince’s Scottish Youth Business Trust in providing microfinance for business start-ups to 18 to 25-year-olds, the work of Glasgow Caledonian University in establishing a partnership with the Grameen Bank to develop the Grameen Caledonian Creative Lab and a Grameen Bank in Scotland and other organisations making a proactive effort and their own contributions in common cause." Supported by: Angela Constance*
